page.shortlink: api inet namespace ssl context class decrypt string method
page.prototype: Result_Flag as C = DecryptString(ResultString as C, SourceString as C, Key as C | Key as B [, Algorithm as C [, Initializer as B]])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: Key
argument.description: A binary value used to decode SourceString.

argument.name: Algorithm
argument.description: Optional. Default = "Blowfish". The encoding algorithm to use. Refer to Encryption Algorithms.

argument.name: Initializer
argument.description: Optional. An advanced feature requiring knowledge of the specific algorithm, much of which is not clearly documented. Additional information to be provided by advanced users depending on the algorithm they use. Refer to the OpenSSL site at www.openssl.org for more information.

page.description: Decrypts a string which has been encrypted and converted to base64 encoding.
page.discussion: The INET::SSLContext::DecryptString() method decrypts a base64 string encoded by INET::SSLContext::EncryptString(). Note: The customer is responsible for verifying that they have met all legal requirements when using any algorithms other than the default.
